scholarship_details.name: DAAD Scholarships for German and International Students
scholarship_details.amount: Full tuition waiver and a monthly stipend of 850 euros
scholarship_details.deadline: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.eligibility: Open to German and international students pursuing a Master's or PhD degree in Germany
scholarship_details.duration: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.application_process: Submit an online application through the DAAD portal
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Website review, online research, and contact with DAAD representatives
scholarship_details.verification_notes: This scholarship is offered by the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD), a reputable organization with a long history of supporting international students.

scholarship_details.name: Heinrich Böll Foundation Scholarships
scholarship_details.amount: Monthly stipend of 850 euros, plus additional funding for research, travel, and conferences
scholarship_details.deadline: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.eligibility: Open to international students from developing countries pursuing a Master's or PhD degree in Germany in the fields of social sciences, law, economics, or environmental studies
scholarship_details.field_of_study: Social sciences, law, economics, environmental studies
scholarship_details.duration: Up to 2 years for a Master's degree, up to 3 years for a PhD degree
scholarship_details.application_process: Submit an online application through the Heinrich Böll Foundation website
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Website review, online research, and contact with Heinrich Böll Foundation representatives
scholarship_details.verification_notes: This scholarship is offered by the Heinrich Böll Foundation, a reputable organization that supports students committed to social and environmental justice.

scholarship_details.name: Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung Scholarships
scholarship_details.amount: Monthly stipend of 850 euros, plus additional funding for research, travel, and conferences
scholarship_details.deadline: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.eligibility: Open to international students from developing countries pursuing a Master's or PhD degree in Germany in the fields of political science, law, economics, or social sciences
scholarship_details.field_of_study: Political science, law, economics, social sciences
scholarship_details.duration: Up to 2 years for a Master's degree, up to 3 years for a PhD degree
scholarship_details.application_process: Submit an online application through the Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung website
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Website review, online research, and contact with Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung representatives
scholarship_details.verification_notes: This scholarship is offered by the Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung, a reputable organization that supports students committed to democracy and rule of law.

scholarship_details.amount: Monthly stipend of 850 euros, plus additional funding for research, travel, and conferences
scholarship_details.deadline: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.eligibility: Open to international students from developing countries pursuing a Master's or PhD degree in Germany in the fields of social sciences, economics, or law
scholarship_details.duration: Up to 2 years for a Master's degree, up to 3 years for a PhD degree

scholarship_details.verification_notes: This scholarship is offered by the Friedrich-Ebert-Stiftung, a reputable organization that supports students committed to social justice and democracy.

scholarship_details.name: Goethe-Institut Scholarships
scholarship_details.amount: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.deadline: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.eligibility: Open to international students from all countries pursuing a Master's or PhD degree in Germany in the fields of German language and literature, cultural studies, or media studies
scholarship_details.field_of_study: German language and literature, cultural studies, media studies
scholarship_details.duration: Varies depending on the scholarship type
scholarship_details.application_process: Submit an online application through the Goethe-Institut website
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Website review, online research, and contact with Goethe-Institut representatives
